data.text:
@SenGaryPeters Senator, history is watching. Silence in the face of #IranMassacare speaks volumes. Iranians are demanding freedom and accountability:
The Iranian people NEED strong, targeted military support. Over 43,000 lives lost in just 48 hours, with thousands more facing execution.
@SenGaryPeters Cool, cool. Hope they didn’t check pronouns first. ‍️
